sqlMap.select:
SELECT TOP $topCnt$ bl.intg_bl_seq, bl.bl_no AS house_bl_no, bl.eta_dt_tm,
bl.biz_clss_cd, bl.grs_wgt_ut_cd, bl.grs_wgt, bl.meas_ut_cd, bl.meas, bl.por_cd, bl.por_nm, '' AS por_nod_cd, bl.pol_cd, bl.pol_nm, bl.pol_nod_cd, bl.pod_cd, bl.pod_nm, bl.pod_nod_cd, bl.del_cd, bl.del_nm, '' AS del_nod_cd,
mbl.bl_no AS master_bl_no, andoc.palt_doc_seq AS an_palt_doc_seq, andoc.palt_doc_tp_cd AS an_palt_doc_tp_cd, CASE WHEN andoc.palt_doc_img_url IS NULL THEN 99 ELSE 1 END AS an_palt_doc_pdf_url,
dodoc.palt_doc_seq AS do_palt_doc_seq, dodoc.palt_doc_tp_cd AS do_palt_doc_tp_cd, CASE WHEN dodoc.palt_doc_img_url IS NULL THEN 99 ELSE 1 END AS do_palt_doc_pdf_url,
shp.trdp_cd AS shpr_trdp_cd, shp.trdp_nm AS shpr_trdp_nm, cne.trdp_cd AS cnee_trdp_cd, cne.trdp_nm AS cnee_trdp_nm, lnr.trdp_cd AS lnr_trdp_cd, lnr.trdp_nm AS lnr_trdp_nm
FROM tb_intg_bl bl JOIN tb_add_info_bnd bnd ON bl.intg_bl_seq = bnd.intg_bl_seq AND bnd.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_intg_bl_rlt rlt ON rlt.intg_bl_seq = bl.intg_bl_seq AND rlt.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_intg_bl mbl ON rlt.rlt_intg_bl_seq = mbl.intg_bl_seq AND mbl.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_palt_shp_doc andoc ON andoc.INTG_BL_SEQ = bl.intg_bl_seq AND andoc.palt_doc_tp_cd = 'AN' AND andoc.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_palt_shp_doc dodoc ON dodoc.INTG_BL_SEQ = bl.intg_bl_seq AND dodoc.palt_doc_tp_cd = 'DO' AND dodoc.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr shp ON bl.intg_bl_seq = shp.intg_bl_seq AND shp.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'S01' AND shp.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr cne ON bl.intg_bl_seq = cne.intg_bl_seq AND cne.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'C01' AND cne.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr lnr ON bl.intg_bl_seq = lnr.intg_bl_seq AND lnr.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'L01' AND lnr.delt_flg = 'N'
WHERE bl.biz_clss_cd = 'H' AND bl.air_sea_clss_cd= #air_sea_clss_cd# AND bnd.bnd_clss_cd = #bnd_clss_cd# AND bl.delt_flg = 'N'
AND andoc.palt_doc_tp_cd IS NOT NULL OR dodoc.palt_doc_tp_cd IS NOT NULL
AND andoc.palt_doc_tp_cd IS NULL OR dodoc.palt_doc_tp_cd IS NULL
AND bl.bl_no LIKE #s_house_bl_no#
AND bl.eta_dt_tm BETWEEN #eta_strdt# AND #eta_enddt#
AND bl.intg_bl_seq IN ( SELECT intg_bl_seq FROM tb_bl_prnr WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND bl_trdp_tp_cd IN( 'C01','S01') AND trdp_cd =#s_trdp_cd# )
ORDER BY bl.intg_bl_seq DESC

SELECT count(bl.intg_bl_seq) FROM tb_intg_bl bl JOIN tb_add_info_bnd bnd ON bl.intg_bl_seq = bnd.intg_bl_seq AND bnd.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_intg_bl_rlt rlt ON rlt.intg_bl_seq = bl.intg_bl_seq AND rlt.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_intg_bl mbl ON rlt.rlt_intg_bl_seq = mbl.intg_bl_seq AND mbl.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_palt_shp_doc andoc ON andoc.INTG_BL_SEQ = bl.intg_bl_seq AND andoc.palt_doc_tp_cd = 'AN' AND andoc.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_palt_shp_doc dodoc ON dodoc.INTG_BL_SEQ = bl.intg_bl_seq AND dodoc.palt_doc_tp_cd = 'DO' AND dodoc.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr shp ON bl.intg_bl_seq = shp.intg_bl_seq AND shp.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'S01' AND shp.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr cne ON bl.intg_bl_seq = cne.intg_bl_seq AND cne.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'C01' AND cne.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr lnr ON bl.intg_bl_seq = lnr.intg_bl_seq AND lnr.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'L01' AND lnr.delt_flg = 'N'
WHERE bl.biz_clss_cd = 'H' AND bl.air_sea_clss_cd= #air_sea_clss_cd# AND bnd.bnd_clss_cd = #bnd_clss_cd# AND bl.delt_flg = 'N'
AND andoc.palt_doc_tp_cd IS NOT NULL OR dodoc.palt_doc_tp_cd IS NOT NULL
AND andoc.palt_doc_tp_cd IS NULL OR dodoc.palt_doc_tp_cd IS NULL
AND bl.bl_no LIKE #s_house_bl_no#
AND bl.eta_dt_tm BETWEEN #eta_strdt# AND #eta_enddt#
AND bl.intg_bl_seq IN ( SELECT intg_bl_seq FROM tb_bl_prnr WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND bl_trdp_tp_cd IN( 'C01','S01') AND trdp_cd =#s_trdp_cd# )

SELECT tmplt_seq, bztp_cd, tmplt_tit, tmplt_msg FROM tb_an_do_tmplt WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND bztp_cd =#s_bztp_cd#
tmplt_seq =#s_tmplt_seq#
SELECT tmplt_seq FROM tb_an_do_tmplt WHERE bztp_cd =#bztp_cd# AND tmplt_tit = #tmplt_tit#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_an_do_tmplt ( tmplt_seq, bztp_cd, tmplt_tit, tmplt_msg, rgst_usrid, rgst_ofc_cd, rgst_tms, modi_usrid, modi_ofc_cd, modi_tms ) VALUES ( #tmplt_seq#, #bztp_cd#, #tmplt_tit#, #tmplt_msg#, #proc_usrid#, #proc_ofccd#, getdate(), #proc_usrid#, #proc_ofccd#, GETUTCDATE(), 'N' )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_an_do_tmplt SET tmplt_msg = #tmplt_msg#, modi_usrid = #proc_usrid#, modi_ofc_cd = #proc_ofccd#, modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE bztp_cd = #bztp_cd# AND tmplt_tit = #tmplt_tit#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.intg_bl_seq , a.bl_no AS house_bl_no, b.bl_trdp_tp_cd, b.trdp_cd AS palt_trdp_cd, b.trdp_nm, b.trdp_pic AS palt_trdp_pic_nm, b.trdp_phn AS palt_trdp_pic_phn, b.trdp_fax AS palt_trdp_pic_fax, b.trdp_eml, b.trdp_addr , c.shrt_nm, c.full_nm,
(SELECT bl_no FROM tb_intg_bl WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND intg_bl_seq = (SELECT rlt_intg_bl_seq FROM tb_intg_bl_rlt WHERE intg_bl_seq = a.intg_bl_seq )) master_bl_no FROM tb_intg_bl a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr b ON a.intg_bl_seq = b.intg_bl_seq AND b.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'N01'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp c ON b.trdp_cd = c.trdp_cd WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N' AND a.air_sea_clss_cd = 'S' AND a.intg_bl_seq = #intg_bl_seq#

SELECT a.intg_bl_seq , a.bl_no AS house_bl_no, b.bl_trdp_tp_cd, b.trdp_cd AS palt_trdp_cd, b.trdp_nm, b.trdp_pic AS palt_trdp_pic_nm, b.trdp_phn AS palt_trdp_pic_phn, b.trdp_fax AS palt_trdp_pic_fax, b.trdp_eml, b.trdp_addr , c.shrt_nm, c.full_nm,
(SELECT bl_no FROM tb_intg_bl WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND intg_bl_seq = (SELECT rlt_intg_bl_seq FROM tb_intg_bl_rlt WHERE intg_bl_seq = a.intg_bl_seq ) ) master_bl_no
FROM tb_intg_bl a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr b ON a.intg_bl_seq = b.intg_bl_seq AND b.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'C01'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp c ON b.trdp_cd = c.trdp_cd
WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N' AND a.air_sea_clss_cd = 'S' AND a.intg_bl_seq = #intg_bl_seq#

SELECT doc.palt_doc_seq, doc.intg_bl_seq, doc.palt_trdp_cd, trd.shrt_nm, trd.full_nm,
doc.palt_trdp_pic_nm, doc.palt_trdp_pic_fax, doc.palt_trdp_pic_phn, doc.palt_doc_tp_cd, doc.palt_doc_nm, doc.palt_doc_no,
doc.palt_doc_img_url, doc.palt_doc_img_nm, doc.palt_doc_pdf_url, doc.palt_doc_pdf_nm,
doc.palt_doc_msg, doc.palt_doc_rmk, doc.tmplt_seq, doc.iss_dt,
hbl.bl_no AS house_bl_no, hbl.ft_dt, mbl.bl_no AS master_bl_no
FROM tb_palt_shp_doc doc JOIN tb_intg_bl hbl ON doc.intg_bl_seq = hbl.intg_bl_seq AND hbl.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_intg_bl_rlt rlt ON hbl.intg_bl_seq = rlt.intg_bl_seq AND rlt.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_intg_bl mbl ON mbl.intg_bl_seq = rlt.rlt_intg_bl_seq AND mbl.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp trd ON doc.palt_trdp_cd = trd.trdp_cd WHERE doc.palt_doc_tp_cd=#s_palt_doc_tp_cd#
AND doc.intg_bl_seq =#s_intg_bl_seq#
AND doc.palt_doc_seq =#s_palt_doc_seq#
SELECT palt_doc_img_url, palt_doc_img_nm, palt_doc_pdf_url, palt_doc_pdf_nm FROM tb_palt_shp_doc a WHERE palt_doc_seq = #s_palt_doc_seq# AND delt_flg = 'N' AND palt_doc_tp_cd = #s_palt_doc_tp_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_palt_shp_doc( palt_doc_seq, intg_bl_seq, palt_trdp_cd, palt_trdp_pic_nm, palt_trdp_pic_fax, palt_trdp_pic_phn, palt_doc_tp_cd, palt_doc_nm, palt_doc_no, palt_doc_msg, palt_doc_rmk, palt_doc_img_url, palt_doc_img_nm, palt_doc_pdf_url, palt_doc_pdf_nm, iss_dt, rgst_usrid, rgst_ofc_cd, rgst_tms, modi_usrid, modi_ofc_cd, modi_tms )VALUES( #palt_doc_seq#, #intg_bl_seq#, #palt_trdp_cd#, #palt_trdp_pic_nm#, #palt_trdp_pic_fax#, #palt_trdp_pic_phn#, #palt_doc_tp_cd#, #palt_doc_nm#, #palt_doc_no#, #palt_doc_msg#, #palt_doc_rmk#, #palt_doc_img_url#, #palt_doc_img_nm#, #palt_doc_pdf_url#, #palt_doc_pdf_nm#, #iss_dt#, #proc_usrid#, #proc_ofccd#, getdate(), #proc_usrid#, #proc_ofccd#, GETUTCDATE() )
sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) from tb_palt_shp_doc WHERE palt_doc_seq = #s_palt_doc_seq# AND palt_doc_tp_cd = #palt_doc_tp_cd#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE tb_palt_shp_doc SET palt_trdp_cd = #palt_trdp_cd#, palt_trdp_pic_nm = #palt_trdp_pic_nm#, palt_trdp_pic_fax = #palt_trdp_pic_fax#, palt_trdp_pic_phn = #palt_trdp_pic_phn#, palt_doc_tp_cd = #palt_doc_tp_cd#, palt_doc_nm = #palt_doc_nm#, palt_doc_no = #palt_doc_no#, palt_doc_msg = #palt_doc_msg#, palt_doc_rmk = #palt_doc_rmk#,
palt_doc_img_url = #palt_doc_img_url#, palt_doc_img_nm = #palt_doc_img_nm#, palt_doc_pdf_url = #palt_doc_pdf_url#, palt_doc_pdf_nm = #palt_doc_pdf_nm#,
iss_dt = #iss_dt#, modi_usrid = #proc_usrid#, modi_ofc_cd = #proc_ofccd#, modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE palt_doc_seq = #palt_doc_seq# AND intg_bl_seq = #intg_bl_seq#
UPDATE tb_palt_shp_doc SET modi_ofc_cd = #proc_usrid#, modi_usrid = #proc_ofccd#, modi_tms = GETUTCDATE(), delt_flg = 'Y' WHERE palt_doc_seq = #palt_doc_seq#
UPDATE tb_intg_bl SET ft_dt = #ft_dt#, modi_usrid = #proc_usrid#, modi_ofc_cd = #proc_ofccd#, modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE intg_bl_seq = #intg_bl_seq#
UPDATE tb_palt_shp_doc SET palt_doc_no = #palt_doc_no#, modi_usrid = #proc_usrid#, modi_ofc_cd = #proc_ofccd#, modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE palt_doc_seq = #s_palt_doc_seq#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MAX(maxInv) as maxInv FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTRING(palt_doc_no,5,4)) = SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, getdate(),12),1,4) THEN 'GLAI'+'$flg$'++SUBSTRING(CAST(SUBSTRING(palt_doc_no,5,8)+100000001 as VARCHAR), 2, 8) ELSE 'GLAI'+'$flg$'++SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, getdate(),12),1,4)+'0001' END AS maxInv FROM tb_palt_shp_doc WHERE SUBSTRING(palt_doc_no, 1,8) = 'GLAI'+SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, getdate(),12),1,4) AND palt_doc_tp_cd = '$flg$' group BY palt_doc_no UNION ALL SELECT 'GLAI'+'$flg$'++ SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, getdate(),12),1,4)+'0001' as maxInv ) a

/* SeiDocArrivalSQL > selectSEI_DOC_1080 */ SELECT a1.intg_bl_seq ,a1.bl_no hbl_no ,a1.pck_qty ,a1.fnl_wh_cd ,a3.ENG_NM fnl_wh_nm ,a2.trdp_cd ,a2.trdp_nm AS trdp_nm ,isnull(trdp.lgl_addr,'') + (case when isnull(trdp.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.state_cd,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.rep_zip,'') != '' then char(13) + trdp.city_nm + ', ' + trdp.state_cd + ' ' + trdp.rep_zip when isnull(trdp.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.state_cd,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.rep_zip,'') = '' then char(13) + trdp.city_nm + ' ' + trdp.state_cd when isnull(trdp.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.state_cd,'') = '' and isnull(trdp.rep_zip,'') = '' then char(13) + trdp.city_nm when isnull(trdp.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.state_cd,'') = '' and isnull(trdp.rep_zip,'') != '' then char(13) + trdp.city_nm + ', ' + trdp.rep_zip else '' end) as trdp_addr ,trdp_pic.pic_nm AS trdp_pic_nm ,trdp_pic.pic_phn AS trdp_phn ,trdp_pic.pic_fax AS trdp_fax ,trdp_pic.pic_eml AS trdp_eml ,a3.trdp_cd AS cfs_trdp_cd ,a3.eng_nm AS cfs_trdp_nm ,isnull(a3.lgl_addr,'') + (case when isnull(a3.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(a3.state_cd,'') != '' and isnull(a3.rep_zip,'') != '' then char(13) + a3.city_nm + ', ' + a3.state_cd + ' ' + a3.rep_zip when isnull(a3.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(a3.state_cd,'') != '' and isnull(a3.rep_zip,'') = '' then char(13) + a3.city_nm + ' ' + a3.state_cd when isnull(a3.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(a3.state_cd,'') = '' and isnull(a3.rep_zip,'') = '' then char(13) + a3.city_nm when isnull(a3.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(a3.state_cd,'') = '' and isnull(a3.rep_zip,'') != '' then char(13) + a3.city_nm + ', ' + a3.rep_zip else '' end) as cfs_trdp_addr ,cfs_pic.pic_nm AS cfs_trdp_pic_nm ,cfs_pic.pic_phn AS cfs_trdp_phn ,cfs_pic.pic_fax AS cfs_trdp_fax ,cfs_pic.pic_eml AS cfs_trdp_eml ,brk.trdp_cd AS brk_trdp_cd ,ntfy.trdp_cd AS ntfy_trdp_cd FROM tb_intg_bl a1 LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr a2 ON a2.intg_bl_seq = a1.intg_bl_seq AND a2.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'C01' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp trdp ON a2.trdp_cd = trdp.trdp_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp_cntc_pson trdp_pic ON trdp.trdp_cd = trdp_pic.trdp_cd AND trdp_pic.rep_flg = 'Y' AND trdp_pic.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr brk ON brk.intg_bl_seq = a1.intg_bl_seq AND brk.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'C03' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr ntfy ON ntfy.intg_bl_seq = a1.intg_bl_seq AND ntfy.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'N01' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp a3 ON a3.trdp_cd = isnull(a1.cfs_trdp_cd,a1.cy_trdp_cd ) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp_cntc_pson cfs_pic ON a3.trdp_cd = cfs_pic.trdp_cd AND cfs_pic.rep_flg = 'Y' AND cfs_pic.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE a1.intg_bl_seq = #s_intg_bl_seq#

/* SeiDocArrivalSQL > selectSEI_DOC_1081 */ SELECT a1.intg_bl_seq ,a1.bl_no hbl_no ,a1.pck_qty ,a1.fnl_wh_cd ,a3.ENG_NM fnl_wh_nm ,a2.trdp_cd ,a2.trdp_nm AS trdp_nm ,isnull(trdp.lgl_addr,'') + (case when isnull(trdp.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.state_cd,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.rep_zip,'') != '' then char(13) + trdp.city_nm + ', ' + trdp.state_cd + ' ' + trdp.rep_zip when isnull(trdp.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.state_cd,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.rep_zip,'') = '' then char(13) + trdp.city_nm + ' ' + trdp.state_cd when isnull(trdp.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.state_cd,'') = '' and isnull(trdp.rep_zip,'') = '' then char(13) + trdp.city_nm when isnull(trdp.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(trdp.state_cd,'') = '' and isnull(trdp.rep_zip,'') != '' then char(13) + trdp.city_nm + ', ' + trdp.rep_zip else '' end) as trdp_addr ,trdp_pic.pic_nm AS trdp_pic_nm ,trdp_pic.pic_phn AS trdp_phn ,trdp_pic.pic_fax AS trdp_fax ,trdp_pic.pic_eml AS trdp_eml ,a3.trdp_cd AS cfs_trdp_cd ,a3.eng_nm AS cfs_trdp_nm ,isnull(a3.lgl_addr,'') + (case when isnull(a3.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(a3.state_cd,'') != '' and isnull(a3.rep_zip,'') != '' then char(13) + a3.city_nm + ', ' + a3.state_cd + ' ' + a3.rep_zip when isnull(a3.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(a3.state_cd,'') != '' and isnull(a3.rep_zip,'') = '' then char(13) + a3.city_nm + ' ' + a3.state_cd when isnull(a3.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(a3.state_cd,'') = '' and isnull(a3.rep_zip,'') = '' then char(13) + a3.city_nm when isnull(a3.city_nm,'') != '' and isnull(a3.state_cd,'') = '' and isnull(a3.rep_zip,'') != '' then char(13) + a3.city_nm + ', ' + a3.rep_zip else '' end) as cfs_trdp_addr ,cfs_pic.pic_nm AS cfs_trdp_pic_nm ,cfs_pic.pic_phn AS cfs_trdp_phn ,cfs_pic.pic_fax AS cfs_trdp_fax ,cfs_pic.pic_eml AS cfs_trdp_eml ,brk.trdp_cd AS brk_trdp_cd ,ntfy.trdp_cd AS ntfy_trdp_cd FROM tb_intg_bl a1 LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr a2 ON a2.intg_bl_seq = a1.intg_bl_seq AND a2.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'C01' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp trdp ON a2.trdp_cd = trdp.trdp_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp_cntc_pson trdp_pic ON trdp.trdp_cd = trdp_pic.trdp_cd AND trdp_pic.rep_flg = 'Y' AND trdp_pic.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr brk ON brk.intg_bl_seq = a1.intg_bl_seq AND brk.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'C03' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr ntfy ON ntfy.intg_bl_seq = a1.intg_bl_seq AND ntfy.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'N01' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp a3 ON a3.trdp_cd = isnull(a1.cfs_trdp_cd,a1.cy_trdp_cd ) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp_cntc_pson cfs_pic ON a3.trdp_cd = cfs_pic.trdp_cd AND cfs_pic.rep_flg = 'Y' AND cfs_pic.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE a1.intg_bl_seq = #s_intg_bl_seq#
